toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
selectQuestionHelper: Find tokens by searching for the name or symbol of the token and pasting its address below
slippageToleranceQuestionHelper: If the exchange rate changes by more than this percentage, the transaction will be restored.
transactionDeadlineQuestionHelper: If your transaction is pending beyond this time limit, the transaction will be restored.
validSlippage: Enter a valid percentage of slippage
pre-emptive: Your deal may be a pre-emptive deal
expertModeQuestionHelper: Allows highly influential price transactions and skips the confirmation step. Use is at your own risk.
yourLiquidityQuestion: You will receive tokens representing a percentage of your pool when you increase your liquidity.
viewLiquidity: Connect to your wallet to view your liquidity.
noPool: Don't see a pool you joined?
importPoolQuestionHelper: Use this tool to find token pairs that do not automatically appear in the interface.
findLiquidity: Select a token to find your liquidity.
connectWalletPool: Connect to a wallet to find a pool.
text1: You will receive pool tokens representing your positions as you increase your liquidity. These tokens will automatically earn fees based on your share of the pool and can be cashed out at any time.
text2: Removal of tokens from the pool will convert your position back to base tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share in the pool. The accrued fees are included in the amount you receive.
text3: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
text4: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
text5: If there is a large adverse price movement prior to confirmation, your trade will resume.
text6: The difference between the market price and the estimated price due to the size of the transaction.
text7: Estimated output. If the price changes by more than {{ slippage }}% your trade will resume.
text8: Please enter a minimum of {{amount}} LP.
text9: Due to token accuracy issues, LP balance cannot be displayed in some wallets, which does not affect pledges and redemptions.
text12: Expert mode turns off confirmation trade alerts and allows for frequent high sliding trades with bad rates and money losses.
text13: Use this mode only if you know what you are doing.
text14: You are not yet mobile in this pool.
text15: Confirm this transaction in your wallet.
text17: These tokens are usually paired with other tokens.
text18: A portion of each transaction (0.30%) flows to the liquidity provider as an agreed incentive.
text19: Estimated output. You will receive at least {{amount}} {{symbol}} otherwise the transaction will resume.
text30: You are creating a liquidity pool.
